name: Alpine
description:
A slightly buggy but nonetheless fun skiing game where the aim is to get from one side of the mountain to the other as quickly as possible.

It can be played by yourself or split screen with a friend.  Once you spawn in you can open your map to see where the goal is. The first person to reach the checkpoint wins. As you go past checkpoints you unlock them as new places to spawn, though the direct path on the map may not always be the fastest route as there are many shortcuts.

This game is recommended to be played with an Xbox controller. It is possible with KBM but the controls are unfinished. 

Also only designed for 16:9 displays (UI might not appear else)

CONTROLS

Move around : LS / AD

Boost : A Button / LShift

Brake : LT / S

Accellerate : RT / W

Menu : Menu Button /  Hold Esc 

Map :  Hold B / M

Enter Chairlift : A Button / LShift
